```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
library(spotifyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
genres |>
  ggplot(aes(x = genre, y = followers.total)) +
  geom_boxplot()

genres |>
  ggplot(aes(x = genre, y = popularity)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
artists_songs |>
  ggplot(aes(x = album_release_date, y = tempo, color = genre)) +
  geom_point() + 
  facet_wrap(~genre)

artists_songs |>
  ggplot(aes(x = popularity, y = energy, color = genre)) +
  geom_point()

artists_songs |>
  ggplot(aes(x = duration_ms, y = popularity, color = genre)) +
  geom_point()

artists_songs |>
  ggplot(aes(x = popularity, color = genre, fill = genre)) +
  geom_bar()

artists_songs |>
  ggplot(aes(x = danceability, color = genre)) +
  geom_density()
```
